string.name: d0
string.value: The outside world is so much better than what I imagined in my egg!

string.name: d1
string.value: Master, if I'm by your side, I'll go anywhere. Anywhere!
Heh, I can defeat a pig with a single toenail! I am a dragon, you know.
I'm so weak from hunger, I couldn't even defeat a pig. The pig would probably end up eating me... I feel so weak...
Look for the word 'impossible' in the dictionary and you'll see a picture of a Dragon eating grass. I refuse to eat it. It's gross! Bleh!
Ugh... My stomach... I feel sick.
Dad probably knows something that can help us! Huh? It's weird that I call him Dad? But what else would I call him? Your dad is my dad, Master.
The Dairy Cow might be a little scary... Just saying...
Ah, so full. Hmm, didn't Dad say he wanted to tell us something?
Yeah, that explanation was a little wordy. To sum it up, you and I share the same destiny.
Ha! Strange Pigs aren't so different from normal Pigs. I can defeat them with one wing tied behind my back.
Haha, I defeated the Strange Pigs! I'm awesome! We better go tell Dad!
So this is what a town looks like. Wow! So many people... And they're all so busy!
So this is what helping people is all about!
Let's help people who are in trouble! I'm sure this town is full of folk who need help.
Train! Train! Traaain! Choo choo! Let's train, Master!
Power B. Fore, from the Hill East of Henesys... Strange name...
Eh, that Power B. Fore guy is kind of a weirdo.
Cynical Orange Mushrooms! Cynical Orange Mushrooms! What does 'cynical' mean anyway?
Master, I'm getting booored...
What kind of oddball would raise Spores? Seriously...
Ribbon Pigs? Bah! They'll topple to the ground if I just poke them with my pinky.
You and I are heroes, Master! What? That deed wasn't significant enough to make us heroes? Psh, big or small, it's the thought that counts. Let's just call ourselves heroes!
Hey, we saw some crying Blue Mushrooms, remember? I thought they were just being overly emotional, but I suppose that's not the case...
Whoa, this puppet has some seriously bad mojo. You feel it?
Luke said he'd need our help when we reach Lv. 20.
A guard isn't as impressive as a hero, but it's still an important job. Of course, I'd love to do it. Besides, who says we can't be both?
Argh! I hate to leave things hanging. I need closure. I won't be able to rest until we catch the culprit. Nella better contact us soon!
Of course I'm curious about me, but I'm more curious about my race. Where are all the other dragons?
Onyx Dragons... Where are they? They have to be around somewhere...
A talking puppet! How bizarre! What? It's bizarre to hear a dragon talk? No, it's not. You're silly!
I'm so glad we cleared up Sabitrama's misunderstanding. Only morons jump to conclusions. What do you mean I do it all the time?
Hmm, that puppet is actually very nice. I didn't expect that.
The folks in your hometown don't know you very well, Master. Not nearly as well as I do. It's kind of sad...
Phew, I'm so glad everything turned out okay. What a relief!
That door with the puppet on it is a big problem. What can we do? Hmm...
Heheheh. That was remarkably heroic, if I do say so myself.
A secret organization of people who do good deeds? Awesome! I'll be like one of those superheroes that hide their identities. Bat-Mir! Mir-verine! IronMir! Oooh, I really want to join!
This organization is truly secretive. It's hard to join, because it's so selective!
Since I gave you one of my precious scales, we'd better find out more about Onyx Dragons.
Onyx Dragons are extinct...? But why? How?
No. How can Onyx Dragons be extinct when I'm right here? Uh-uh. There have to be other Onyx Dragons somewhere!
Yay, we're in! We're in! We're part of the secret organization!
This secret organization is more secretive than I imagined... What's the point of being so secretive when you're just helping other people?
A clue about Onyx Dragons? Let's ask, Master! Right now!
Go, go, go! To Lith Harbor! To John! He might know something about my race!
I can't wait to find others like me!
Another super secret mission from a super secret organization...
Hmm, how is that strange creature, Shammos, related to the secret organization? I can't figure it out.
Let's rush to that island where the dragons live, Master!
At least now I know there's another dragon out there. I can wait longer if I have to. We'll be reunited someday. I just know it.
Ah, so the mystery of the secret organization is revealed! Sort of... But there's still so much I don't understand.
I've got a bad feeling about this mission. Is it all in my head?
What the... It's our fourth mission and we're still only temporary members?
Something... Something just isn't right...
What in the world just happened?! I don't understand what's going on...
That Dragon talked to me! I'm sure of it!
Master, I wasn't able to look into his memory. Tell me! Tell me!
Those Black Wings... They tricked us! They destroyed my species! I will never forgive them...

string.name: n0
string.value: Beautiful snow, beautiful ice...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm not scared.

string.name: d0
string.value: It's not that I don't like living here serving the Snow Spirit... but...

string.name: d1
string.value: It's not that I don't like living here serving the Snow Spirit... but...

string.name: name
string.value: Jenn's Brother

string.name: n0
string.value: Eh heh heh, it feels great to be in town.

string.name: n1
string.value: When will my brother get back?

string.name: d0
string.value: It's dangerous outside of town. Best stay inside, where it's safe. I hope my brother's okay.

string.name: d1
string.value: It's dangerous outside of town. Best stay inside, where it's safe. I hope my brother's okay.

string.name: name
string.value: Barrier Totem

string.name: func
string.value: Armor Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: I personally welcome you to El Nath...and for that, how about taking a look at some nice armors around here?

string.name: n1
string.value: Without armors, you may run into some trouble against the monsters...so take a look around them and see if you like any one of them.

string.name: n0
string.value: Hello I'm Hana, the master alchemist in this town. Go take a look around and see if you find anything you like.

string.name: n1
string.value: Welcome! Whatever you may need for your journey, I have them all.

string.name: func
string.value: Scroll Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: I made these scrolls, so I can guarantee that these all work to perfection!

string.name: n1
string.value: Making scrolls is even easier than hunting down slimes.

string.name: s1
string.value: There will be a time when... I'll get out of here... out of this darkness

string.name: d0
string.value: Hehe...I need to gather up the strength right now!

string.name: d1
string.value: Hehe...the masterplan is well underway.

string.name: g0
string.value: I will use the secret door to get to the ravine. Why don't you guys go through Ice Valley?

string.name: s0
string.value: Thank you for protecting me.

string.name: s1
string.value: I knew I could count on someone like you.

string.name: n0
string.value: From Crimson Balrog to Lycanthrope ... I'm concerned about the fact that those monsters are getting more and more powerful by the day.

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm very much relieved to know that there are people willing to fight these monsters.

string.name: s0
string.value: Har har... Shammos knows... He will resurrect soon...

string.name: s1
string.value: Hurry, remove my shackles.

string.name: d0
string.value: I must gather my strength!

string.name: g0
string.value: Now, follow me through my secret path.

string.name: d1
string.value: Everything is going according to plan...

string.name: name
string.value: Message from Shammos

string.name: name
string.value: Glacial Water

string.name: n0
string.value: Let's go seal up Rex again.

string.name: n1
string.value: This is taking too long.

string.value: Danger Zone Taxi

string.value: Dungeon Guide

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't even think about entering here...it's not some place where anyone can just waltz in...

string.name: n1
string.value: Only the strongest can enter here...if you want in, talk to me

string.name: name
string.value: Sergeant Bravo

string.name: n0
string.value: Where is this? Where's Master Sergeant Fox?

string.name: n1
string.value: Ahh...it's cold here...but I can't be stopped!

string.name: d0
string.value: It's so cold around here! I'm #b#p2030001##k, member of the Alpha Platoon. We got on an accident in mid-flight and made an emergency landing here, but I can't find the others. I'm pretty confident that they're all okay, though.

string.name: d1
string.value: Did you get #b#t4031049##k to #b#p2020003##k? Do I need anything? Well, not for now. But come see me later, alright?

string.name: name
string.value: Corporal Easy

string.name: n0
string.value: Where did the Sergeant and Staff Sergeant go???

string.name: n1
string.value: Eh...?? I don't think this is where I was supposed to land...

string.name: d0
string.value: This is a strange place. It looks like an abandoned tower. Oh, I'm #b#p2030002##k, member of the Alpha Platoon. We met with an accident in mid-flight and made an emergency landing here, but I can't find the others. I'm pretty confident that they're all okay, though.

string.name: d1
string.value: This is a strange place. It looks like an abandoned tower. Oh, I'm #b#p2030002##k, member of the Alpha Platoon. We met with an accident in mid-flight and made an emergency landing here, but I can't find the others. I'm pretty confident that they're all okay, though.

string.value: Rock Covered in Snow

string.value: Small Tomb

string.name: name
string.value: Holy Stone

string.name: name
string.value: Piece of Statue

string.name: d1
string.value: There seems to be nothing under this Piece of Statue anymore.

string.name: n0
string.value: This used to be a peaceful town ... until one day, monsters started popping out of everywhere.

string.name: n1
string.value: In the deepest part of the Zakum Dungeon rest the strongest of the foes.

string.name: n2
string.value: Does anyone want to try the Zakum Quest?

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to the retreat.

string.name: n1
string.value: I have various items here for you. Go take a look.

string.name: n2
string.value: The items may not be up to par with the town, but feel free to look around.

string.name: n0
string.value: Talk to me if you want to drop out any time.

string.name: n1
string.value: It won't get any easier as you move on...

string.name: n0
string.value: The only way out is to talk to me.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want out, then talk to me.

string.name: n0
string.value: I've been in here for 30 years now...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm working on gathering up the materials for some spells.

string.name: d0
string.value: It's been a while since I last saw a person here, a place far far away from humanity. I've been in need of help, and I'm glad to see you here.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me gather up samples of the monsters. Thanks to you the research has picked up steam, but honestly, I can use some more samples. If you see me by the time I run out of these samples, who knows, I may ask you for more.

string.name: n0
string.value: To challenge Zakum, you'll need to form a Zakum Squad.

string.name: n1
string.value: Talk to me if you are willing to form a Zakum Squad.

string.name: name
string.value: Ancient Icy Stone

string.name: name
string.value: Secret Rock

string.name: d0
string.value: (A strange Stump. When you put your hand in it, you discover it's hollow inside.)

string.name: d1
string.value: (A strange Stump. When you put your hand in it, you discover it's hollow inside.)

string.name: n0
string.value: Spiruna tend to get overly aggressive at times...but once you get to know her, she is really a nice person at heart.

string.name: n1
string.value: I've been assisting Spiruna while working hard myself, but it hasn't been easy...

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm #bSpiruna#k's assistant. Please forgive me for not giving you my name. Spiruna has been busy working on a new, difficult spell, and so she's quite edgy right now. Unless it's an urgent matter, I suggest you leave her alone.

string.name: d1
string.value: I'm #bSpiruna#k's assistant. Please forgive me for not giving you my name. Spiruna has been busy working on a new, difficult spell, and so she's quite edgy right now. Unless it's an urgent matter, I suggest you leave her alone.

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm working on an important magic, so please don't bother me.

string.name: n1
string.value: Kids these days...they just barge into someone else's home as if it's nothing...

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm in the middle of a very important work here so please don't bother me and leave this place. I can't concentrate when a stranger is around.

string.name: d1
string.value: I'm in the middle of a very important work here so please don't bother me and leave this place. I can't concentrate when a stranger is around.

string.name: n0
string.value: Please gather up the ore of fire and the paper document. The more documents you have, the better it is.

string.name: n1
string.value: You'll need a special item to go into the inner part of Zakum.

string.name: n0
string.value: Apparently there is an unfathomably powerful monster inside Zakum.

string.name: n1
string.value: Wow, you definitely worked your way up here.

string.name: d1
string.value: (The lava is boiling.)

string.name: n1

string.name: name
string.value: Delv the Toy Soldier

string.name: n0
string.value: I can't let anyone and everyone in.

string.name: n1
string.value: It's my job to protect this place.

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm sorry, but I cannot let anyone inside this place. There's a monster that has invaded Ludibrium, and is currently hidden in this place. It's very dangerous here, so I advise you to leave this minute unless you're involved in this. Now, if you'll excuse me...

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that gathered up the #b#t4031093##k for me. I am still eating those every now and then. Oh, by the way, have you talked to #b#p2040002##k, the guy next to me?

string.name: name
string.value: Olson the Toy Soldier

string.name: n0
string.value: You'll need to find the ones that are different in shapes.

string.name: n1
string.value: This room is not available for the public.

string.name: d0
string.value: Thanks to the crack of dimension, a monster from other dimension entered this place, stole a very important item, and is currently hidden in this room. I don't know how strong the monster it is, but no one wants to enter this room. Hmmm... we need to locate this monster and kill it, and recover the important item. We are in trouble...

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that not only defeated the monster from the other dimension, but also helped us fix the Ludibrium Clocktower. I can't thank you enough for all your hard work. Thanks to you, everything is alright now. Hope you have a great time here at Ludibrium!

string.name: name
string.value: Assistant Cheng

string.name: n0
string.value: This castle possesses many hidden towers.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please try to be quiet once inside.

string.name: d0
string.value: Lately we've been experiencing the disapperance of mechanical parts here at the factory, and we have no idea who's been committing this dastardly act. The factory can't run if the parts keep disappearing.

string.name: d1
string.value: Aren't you the one that helped me find the lost #b#t4031092##k here at the Toy Factory? Thanks to you, this place is running smoothly these days.

string.name: name
string.value: Roly-Poly 1

string.name: n0
string.value: Ludibrium is SO enormous, I can't ever take a day off here.

string.name: n1
string.value: There are so many places that need some fixing.

string.name: d0
string.value: I used to work at the Toy Factory inside the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I've been sent here to fix the destroyed parts of Eos Tower. The number of monsters have steadily increased, though, making this job very difficult for myself and other Roly-Poly's.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that took my picture the other day. Have you met up with all 10 of us Roly Poly's? And you gave those pictures to #b#p2040015##k, right? I think our manager will be relieved after seeing those pictures and concentrate on his work.

string.value: Those workers ... are they working hard even when I'm not around?

string.name: n1
string.value: Oh no, I forgot to bring my lunchbox to work today...

string.name: n2
string.value: I'm #p2040015# for this place. There are many dangerous machines around, so please be careful.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello there! I'm #b#p2040015##k, the one in charge of the Toy Factory. Today's another one of those busy days...

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh! You're the one that met up with our Roly Poly's at the Eos Tower for me! How can I help you here? Huh? Haha, of course, I did not forget the lunch box my daughter made for me. I'm just waiting for lunch so I can eat them! I'll see you around!

string.name: func
string.value: Refining Expert

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't you want to make something? It's a piece of cake for me!

string.name: n1
string.value: Hmmm ... you can gather up some really fine materials here at Ludibrium.

string.name: name
string.value: Green Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: As long as we're here, everything will be fine!

string.name: n1
string.value: Did we ... miss our takeoff?

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm here taking care of a very important mission given to me by the Omega Sector. It is very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run right now.

string.name: d1
string.value: The Roswell Field is prone to aliens making apperances, so this place is under special constant watch. The attack is still on, so I suggest you and others not to get too comfortable in this place. I'll have to head back to the Sector for some more work, so I'll see you around!

string.name: name
string.value: Black Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: Pink Mesoranger is ALWAYS late ... we can't be at our 100% strength unless all 5 of us are here.

string.name: n1
string.value: Nothing scares us when all 5 of us are here!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello! I'm #b#p2040018##k, in charge of a mission to prevent the aliens from invading this place. It seems like they have been acting up more lately. It's very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run back to the Omega Sector for safety.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me get rid of #b#o4230116##k here at the Kulan Field. It feels good to find someone like you here at a place where dangerous aliens are a common sight. I'm still investigating on the mastermind behind these aliens. I'm going up against yet another alien, so it's not easy...

string.name: func
string.value: Doctor Assistant

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to our hospital! Your face looks terrrrrible. Need my help?

string.name: n1

string.value: It is easy to make gloves!

string.name: n0

string.name: n1
string.value: Have you ever heard about stimulator? With this... haha... yeah...

string.name: d1

string.value: Please don't tell me you're giving up already.

string.name: func
string.value: Tour Guide

string.name: n0
string.value: How about taking a ride to the most exotic island in MapleStory, the Florina Beach?

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you have the power ticket by any chance? Then you should get on the ride and enjoy the fun.

string.name: d0
string.value: Don't you want to head off to Florina Beach?

string.name: d1
string.value: You look tired and exhausted. How about spending some relaxing time at Florina Beach?

string.name: name
string.value: Candy Machine

string.name: name
string.value: Eurek the Alchemist

string.name: s0
string.value: With a few materials, you can make summoning rocks and magic rocks

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello there. I'm Eurek the Alchemist, wandering around places all over the world of MapleStory. I'm here just to stop by for a bit.

string.name: s0
string.value: This is what you call the best medicine one can ever make!

string.name: s1
string.value: You can recover quickly, or can temporarily move to avoid yourself from the chips.

string.name: s2
string.value: I sell potions! Good potions!

string.name: a0
string.value: What do you think?

string.name: s3
string.value: I made this myself, so there just aren't many left. You should buy them now before it gets too late.

string.name: a1
string.value: Check this place out. Isn't it cool?

string.name: name
string.value: Wiz the Librarian

string.name: n0
string.value: This library isn't full of old, boring books. We also have books full of great animated books...or so we used to...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'd love to find the lost books ASAP.

string.name: d0
string.value: Oh no, the books are all mixed up.

string.name: d1
string.value: This library is finally beginning to resemble that of a normal library.

string.name: n0
string.value: If you want to get on board to the ship that heads to Orbis, then please hand me the ticket.

string.name: n1
string.value: There's a limited capacity on this trip, so please get on board now! We're about to take off!

string.name: n2
string.value: Please be aware that if you go into the Cash Shop while on board, you'll be sent back to Ludibrium.

string.name: func
string.value: Cabin Crew

string.name: n0
string.value: Can I help you with anything? Enjoy your trip!

string.name: n1
string.value: Anyone that wants to leave the ship and head back to the original spot, talk to me.

string.name: n2
string.value: Please be aware that if you go into the Cash Shop while on board, you'll be sent back to where you were before.

string.name: func
string.value: Weapon Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: There are places in Ludibrium where the monsters pop out of nowhere.

string.name: n1
string.value: We have a weapon JUST FOR YOU!

string.name: func
string.value: Armor Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome! Look around, see what you like.

string.name: n1
string.value: A tough armor is necessary, for the monsters may pop up anywhere inside the castle.

string.name: n0
string.value: Make sure you don't get lost inside the castle.

string.name: n1
string.value: Welcome to Ludibrium!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello, there! I'm #b#p2041004##k, in charge of the security for Ludibrium. Lately there have been some filthy creatures dirtying up Eos Tower, and I don't like it one bit.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hey! You're the one that cleaned out the Eos Tower for me last time! How have you been? I'm so glad the number of monsters have generally decreased, and they aren't as wild as they were before. I really appreciate all your hard work. Oh well, hope you have a great day at Ludibrium!

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey, there! How's it going?

string.name: n1
string.value: Isn't it beautiful today? I would like nothing more than just go somewhere...

string.name: d0
string.value: Oh, hi! I don't think I've met you before... have you been traveling around? I'm #b#p2041005##k, residing here in Ludibrium, and my father is the manager of the Toy Factory. If you have time, you should go see that place.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hello!! Thanks to you, my dad got his appetite back. He really enjoys it. How can I help you today? Oh no! You shouldn't enter this place with your shoes on! I cleaned up this place just now, you know!!! If you don't have much else to do, then please come back some other time!

string.name: n0
string.value: We sell stuff that you can't find anywhere else!

string.name: n1
string.value: Need potions or some food? You've come to the right place.

string.name: a0
string.value: You! You aren't jacking anything from here, right?

string.name: a1
string.value: Touch anything here, and I'll be very very angry with you!

string.name: g0
string.value: It's tougher than you think, making new potions

string.name: g1
string.value: Hah! Just making new potions here ...

string.name: n0
string.value: Oh my, you still have that hairdo? That's sooo yesterday ...

string.name: n1
string.value: If you want to try a different hair style, then just talk to me!

string.name: func
string.value: Storage Keeper

string.name: n0
string.value: Looking for a place to store your mesos or items? Then look no further!

string.name: n1
string.value: Our storage is safe as a lock, so feel free to leave your stuff here!

string.name: n1
string.value: It's a tough act being a hair stylist...

string.name: n0
string.value: Welcome to our hair salon! I may still be in training, but how about letting me do your hair?

string.name: d0
string.value: Welcome to our Hair Salon! I'm still learning, but would you let me do your hair?

string.name: d1
string.value: Strong explorers are awesome! But good-looking once are even better!

string.name: func
string.value: Plastic Surgeon

string.name: n0
string.value: Wanna change your face into something ... much more beautiful?

string.name: n1
string.value: You look fine now, but with a little touch here and there, you'll look FANTABULOUS

string.name: name
string.value: Yellow Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: Worried about monsters? Let us handle them!

string.name: n1
string.value: It's our job to protect everyone here!

string.name: d0
string.value: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, in charge of a special mission here. Have you seen an alien around here? Apparently they attract innocent strangers by sweet-talking to them, so please be aware of that.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, in charge of a special mission here. Have you seen an alien around here? Apparently they attract innocent strangers by sweet-talking to them, so please be aware of that.

string.name: name
string.value: Pink Mesoranger

string.name: n0
string.value: It's so hard to wake up early each morning. I should stop being late ...

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm more than happy to protect you all, except for the fact that I sleep waaay too much...

string.name: d0
string.value: Hello, there. I'm #b#p2041012##k of Omega Sector, currently in a secret mission to prevent the alien invasion here. I've been really busy these days taking care of important missions. This place is very dangerous, so I suggest you get out of here and go to a safer place.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're back! I've been getting up on time these days, and I'm never late on missions. I'm also glad the people upstairs are taking notice. It's all thanks to you. Now, I have something important to do, so please excuse me!

string.name: n0
string.value: You want to have a slim & sexy body like me? I will make your skin beautiful!

string.name: n1
string.value: Wow... you must be traveling all around... your skin got damaged a lot...

string.name: func
string.value: Pet Food Merchant

string.name: n0
string.value: Are you looking for the pet food?

string.name: n1
string.value: Aren't your pets hungry? I got some food for them!

string.name: f0
string.value: I feel like I've witnessed something incredible.

string.name: f1
string.value: ...I don't remember...the last few months...that I've been...missing...

string.name: f2
string.value: I've been trying to remember things, but it's hard.

string.name: f3
string.value: Did something terrible happen to me?

string.name: w0
string.value: Whenever I think about that day ... I get swept with fear, and tears would just come out.

string.name: w1
string.value: Please ... someone help me regain my lost memory.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hmmm...? I don't think we've ever met. What are you doing at my house? If you don't have anything to talk about, then please leave.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me find my lost memories. I can't thank you enough for your effort. I've been trying to live a normal life these days.

string.name: func
string.value: Scroll Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: I admit, I have failed in making scrolls every once in a while, but that's few and far between!

string.name: n1
string.value: I've made my share of mistakes making these scrolls, but don't worry, I'm good at this!

string.name: name
string.value: Ace of Hearts

string.name: n0
string.value: A sweet chocolate can go a long way towards helping you say I LOVE YOU!

string.name: n1
string.value: I, Mr. Ace of Hearts, will let you in on a secret recipe to a sweet chocolate of love !

string.name: d0
string.value: I am here to bake lovely goods for everyone who needs my service! Doesn't it smell good around here? Mmmm Hmmm!

string.name: d1
string.value: I can only make so much of it by myself. Please bear with me, for I can only make one per hour for you.

string.name: name
string.value: Hans the Assembler

string.name: n0
string.value: What should I make today?

string.name: f0
string.value: I am the best when it comes to assembling toys here at the Toy Factory.

string.name: f1
string.value: Gather up the materials I ask of you, and I'll make something nice for you in return!

string.name: d0
string.value: I just need few things to make a fun toy to play around with...but I don't know if I'm even allowed to make this.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hey, what's going on? Have you tried using the stuff I gave you the other day? That item had some experimental elements to it, and therefore a little dangerous, but it was fun making something I've always wanted to make. I have to get back to work now!

string.name: name
string.value: Rocky the Repairman

string.name: n0
string.value: Why does this keep breaking down?

string.name: d0
string.value: It's broken again...and I just fixed this not too long ago! Who did this? If only I can get my hands on whoever that's responsible for this...ARRGH!

string.name: d1
string.value: Oh no, it must be the monsters again. As soon as I fix this, they come rushing back and break things again. Oh hey, how long have you been there? Thanks to the parts you got me, I've been fixing machines here and there, but they seem to break every other day, so I have no time to rest. I gotta go! Bye!

string.name: name
string.value: Mac the Mechanic

string.name: n0
string.value: These machines should be taken care of on a daily basis...

string.name: d0
string.value: Great weather today. I'm #b#p2041020##k, working here at the Toy Factory. I'm in charge of making blueprints for the machines around here, as well as fixing them if necessary.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're back. I've been busy here working thanks to the documents you got me. Oh, and this time, I hid it in a safe just in a case. I have to get back to work now. See you around!

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Bouffon

string.name: n0
string.value: We need to find the source of power for the time sphere which is at the center of Ludibrium.

string.name: n1
string.value: We need an energy replacement for the time sphere. Please gather up Tachion.

string.name: s0
string.value: It is important to seal up the cracked dimension in order to prevent it from running away.

string.name: s1
string.value: If you break the time sphere, you'll see the source of all evil face to face!

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm Mr. Bouffon, in charge of protecting the tunnel of time.

string.name: d1
string.value: Thanks to you the root of all evil in Ludibrium is gone forever! Only the peaceful days shall lay ahead.

string.name: s0

string.name: d1
string.value: Aren't you the honorable traveler? Did you meet with #t1012109#? You remind me of my own traveling days...I was one fearless kid back then...

string.name: s0
string.value: Magic show!

string.name: s1
string.value: Check out this eye-popping magic!

string.name: d0

string.name: d1

string.value: Machine Apparatus

string.name: d0

string.name: d1

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you want something from me?

string.name: d0
string.value: I can't believe I'm here doing chores like this. I understand it's an order, but that doesn't make this any easier to do.

string.name: d1
string.value: For Hellin to look out for someone like you... it is indeed quite surprising. Well, I'm sure it's not all that fun to be paid attention to. He's quite ruthless, to say the least.

string.name: n0
string.value: This is the time control room for Ludibrium. Only the proper personnel may enter this place.

string.name: n1
string.value: I can't believe the security device for the time controller is broken. What should I do...?

string.name: d0
string.value: Oh no, someone destroyed the security device for the time controller!

string.name: d1

string.name: n0
string.value: The end is coming!

string.name: n1
string.value: You, too, can be chosen!

string.name: d0
string.value: Let's patiently wait for Him, the Black Mage, to resurrect.

string.value: Death Teddy

string.name: d0
string.value: Someone broke the security device on the time controller! Thanks to them, the portal to the past will now be open all the time. I wonder where I will go if I take that portal...

string.name: d1
string.value: Freely traveling time and space... The goddess will never forgive you.

string.name: n0
string.value: One, two, three, four... Wait a minute! That one's not mine!

string.name: n1
string.value: Sigh... Parenting is so hard...

string.name: d0

string.value: All of my kids make me happy... But I never have a second to myself. I'm always busy counting my babies.

string.value: It is so hard to find the materials for the weapon in these days. There are just too many monsters.

string.value: Dr. Kim

string.name: n0
string.value: We need to get going soon, but where is everyone?

string.name: d0
string.value: Ohh ... the greatest masterpiece of all time, by me! With this blueprint, I can make the most indestructable robot ever!

string.name: d1
string.value: Hmmm ... the fuel's fine, the parts are fine ... and, by debugging this critical error of the Alpha system ... huh? Can I help you? I'm busy developing new machines, so unless you need me for something, talk to someone else. I need to get back to work now.

string.name: n1
string.value: Hmm... You guys are not strong enough to fight against aliens yet...

string.name: name
string.value: Alien Gray

string.name: n0
string.value: My name is Gray from the space...

string.name: n1
string.value: I want to be friends with you

string.name: d0
string.value: The Omega Sector is busy attacking innocent aliens again ... it's just unfortunate ...

string.name: d1
string.value: Hahaha, you fool. The critical document you gave me is currently in the process of deciphering. Omega Sector has been impossible to attack because of their tight security, but I'm sure the deciphering will be done soon. I don't need you anymore, so get away from me!

string.value: Armor Seller

string.name: n0
string.value: We have lots of excellent armor in Omega Sector.

string.name: n1
string.value: You must have good armor to fight against the aliens.

string.value: Kubo the Storageman

string.name: func
string.value: Storage Keeper

string.name: n0
string.value: Are you looking for the storage place?

string.name: n1
string.value: My storage is totally safe! I guarantee you...

string.name: n0
string.value: Tsk, Tsk... I'll be late if I don't get going!

string.name: n1
string.value: As long as I am here, this place is safe!

string.name: d0
string.value: Sigh ... This is the first time I'm resting in a long time. I've been up the past few days on missions. string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now, I need to finish the training, so please excuse me

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm getting tired of going on missions every day.

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm #b#p2050006##k from the Omega Sector, currently on a secret mission. You look like a traveler, and eventhough you seem to be on our side, I can't divulge any information regarding this mission.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now I need to get back to work...

string.name: n0
string.value: Where is Mirol...?

string.name: n0
string.value: Hoon is always whining

string.name: n1
string.value: We need to have female pilots

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm #b#p2050007##k from the Omega Sector, currently on a secret mission. You look like a traveler, and even though you seem to be on our side, I can't divulge any information regarding this mission.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now I need to get back to work...

string.name: name
string.value: General Maestro

string.name: n0
string.value: My army is here to protect this place, yesterday, today and tomorrow.

string.name: n1
string.value: I have no time to talk, for I am in the middle of an important operation.

string.name: d0
string.value: Thanks for coming to the Omega Sector. Please stay on your toes, because the aliens may attack any minute. Oh, by the way, someone in the Sector needs your help. If you're interested, go see that person.

string.name: d1
string.value: The weather is just perfect outside. This place is full of security, protecting itself from the aliens. It's been awfully quiet these past few days, which troubles me, but I can't stand pat. Oh, by the way, the work you did for me the other day, that's going great now.

string.name: name
string.value: Jr. Officer Medin

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm in charge of protecting the general as well as directing the army.

string.name: n1
string.value: I am not going to tolerate anyone slacking off!

string.name: d1
string.value: Good work, sir! I will keep doing my best for General Maestro, sir!

string.name: d0
string.value: Salut! Could you help me on something?

string.name: name
string.value: Rice the Medic

string.name: n0
string.value: I've studied a lot, but I don't have any real working experience yet.

string.name: n1
string.value: The red medicine should take care of most injuries.

string.name: d0
string.value: Please be careful of your every act here in Omega Sector. How can I help you? My name is #b#p2050010##k, and as you can see, I take care of the wounded here. I'm always on my toes here, in case aliens attacked.

string.name: d1
string.value: Please be careful of your every act here in Omega Sector. How can I help you? My name is #b#p2050010##k, and as you can see, I take care of the wounded here. I'm always on my toes here, in case aliens attacked.

string.name: name
string.value: Kevin the Soldier

string.name: n0
string.value: I heard that it's full of aliens outside... I wish I could go there and fight them too.

string.name: n1
string.value: Jr. Officer Medin is famous for being so strict.

string.name: d0
string.value: Sigh. I wish I could go outside and defeat the aliens myself, but the only work I am getting is restricted to here at the headquarters. I am confident that I can do a good job too. When can I go out and combat them...?

string.name: d1
string.value: Sigh. I wish I could go outside and defeat the aliens myself, but the only work I am getting is restricted to here at the headquarters. I am confident that I can do a good job too. When can I go out and combat them...?

string.name: n0
string.value: Have you ever seen an alien...?

string.name: n1
string.value: Make sure not to tell anyone about me.

string.name: d0
string.value: Shhh... I advise you not to act like you know me here. The Omega Sector is the safest place in this world, as well as the most threatened. Unless you need me for something important, please excuse me right this minute.

string.name: d1
string.value: Hmmm... Fortunately #b#p2041015##k seems to have found his memory back. Please warn her not to get abducted by the aliens again. Now, please excuse me, for I have business to take care of.

string.value: Agent M

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm Porter, a researcher here at Omega Sector.

string.name: n1
string.value: I have so much to research, I don't even have time to sleep.

string.name: n0
string.value: Open your item inventory and you'll find equip., use, set-up, etc. and cash tabs.

string.name: n1
string.value: The item you pick up is automatically stored in an appropriate item category. What do you think? Isn't it cool?

string.name: n2
string.value: Double-click on an item in the item inventory and you'll be able to use it.

string.name: f0
string.value: You want to discard an item? Then click on an item in the inventory, and drag it out of the window.

string.name: f1
string.value: If your item inventory is full, you won't be able to take in new items. You should take care of the unimportant ones by either discarding them or selling them at a store.

string.name: f2
string.value: Use items can also be stored on the bottom right tray where you can assign HotKey's...

string.name: w0
string.value: You'll die once your HP reaches 0, so it's for your own good to take a potion or food before it's too late.

string.name: w1
string.value: You want to travel now? Then come talk to me...

string.name: w2
string.value: If you want to talk to someone, click on them

string.value: Hey, nice weather, isn't it?

string.name: d1

string.value: What did my sister say? oh~ I am so hungry...

string.value: You should train yourself well before going on the journey.

string.value: If you want to move on to the next stage, talk to me.

string.name: w0
string.value: So you're ready for the adventure?

string.name: w1
string.value: Now it's all up to you to train yourself. Good luck!

string.name: w2
string.value: We instructors are all related. Roger, my older brother, and Robin, my younger brother, all work together here.

string.name: h1
string.value: So what's my relationship with Roger? Hahaha...he's my older brother!

string.name: d0
string.value: You should train yourself well before going on the journey.

string.value: You should train yourself well before going on the journey.

string.value: Watch out for the monsters

string.value: You should attack the monsters with the right timing

string.value: That was "Mushroom Town". There are Amherst and South Perry in this Island

string.name: f2

string.name: w0
string.value: If you go there, you might see Robin

string.name: w1
string.value: Good Luck

string.name: d0
string.value: If you don't know where to go, I will let you know.

string.name: n3
string.value: If it's a powerful monster, how about teaming up with someone else?

string.name: f0
string.value: You need to time the attack right to take down the monsters easily.

string.value: The town you just saw is called Mushroom Town. You'll also find places called Southperry and Amherst on this island.

string.name: f2
string.value: If you want to head over to a bigger, wider area, try heading up northeast.

string.name: w0
string.value: You met up with my brothers Roger and Peter before, right?

string.name: w1
string.value: Best of luck to you!

string.name: n0
string.value: You can be even stronger, if you get a lesson from Mai

string.name: n1
string.value: Go to the right and then you can meet bunch of other people

string.name: n2
string.value: Press "w" to see the current position.

string.name: n3
string.value: How about partying with other players?

string.name: f0
string.value: You should attack the monsters with the right timing

string.name: f1
string.value: You would see lot of new things if you go to Amherst

string.name: f2
string.value: Go to North-East~

string.name: w0
string.value: Even if you don't know the way, just go~

string.value: Good Luck

string.name: d0
string.value: huh? My name is Sam...

string.name: d1
string.value: So you did see Mia huh?

string.name: n0
string.value: Ahh...I need to get this letter sent...

string.name: a0
string.value: Why isn't anyone passing by!!

string.name: l0
string.value: Whoa, time's going fast...it may be too late...

string.name: h0
string.value: Ahh...what should I do...

string.name: d0
string.value: I should bring this to #m1000000#.

string.name: d1
string.value: Now I can deliver important news to the town. Thanks a lot. I wish I didn't misplace that hat I found, that would have made a nice gift...

string.name: d1
string.value: It might be only few tree branches but it will be a big help when gathered. It could build a boat that sails over the sea.

string.name: n0
string.value: Working hard there~

string.name: d0
string.value: I am good at making anything! Since my uncle is Pio in Amherst, he used to teach me lots of things when I was young.

string.name: n0
string.value: Hmm...looks like I'm still the best looking man in this town.

string.name: n1
string.value: Hey you! What are you looking at! If you're admiring at my good looks, might as well say it!!

string.name: n2
string.value: One of these days, I'll be the one operating that huge ship, and take off to a far bigger land...

string.name: d0
string.value: I can't stay in this town forever. Is there anyone who can help me?

string.name: d1
string.value: Thanks for the last time. Now, if I get just little more money, I probably can start the business. Are you still using the weapon, which I gave you?

string.name: n0
string.value: I am the captain, dang it!! Don't be looking down on me!

string.name: n1
string.value: I'll take you anywhere you want

string.value: Let's see...I'm ready to make some money...

string.value: Hello everyone! I've got some goods here for sale!!

string.name: n2
string.value: Anyone that steals will not go unpunished!!

string.name: n0
string.value: Whoa, what are you looking at?!?!

string.name: d0
string.value: When will I be able to explore the bigger world outside the Maple World?

string.name: d1
string.value: Even if it is Orange Mushroom, not Red Snail, It doesn't bother me a bit. I have been training with Maya for a long time! ^^ Oh, this is a secret just between you and me!

string.name: n0
string.value: Stranger...what are you doing here?

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm not too fond of the strangers. I'm only worried about the peace of this town.

string.name: n2
string.value: You...if you're strong and powerful, can you take care of the monsters around town?

string.name: d0
string.value: A letter from #r#p2103##k should be here, any minute. Is there something wrong? Hmm...

string.name: d1
string.value: You safely delivered my reply to #r#p2103##k? Thanks~ so #r#p2103##k gave you a present? Haha... He is one of the best for making a hat....

string.name: n0
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today?

string.name: n1
string.value: To jump, press the left Alt key.

string.name: n2
string.value: Press the arrow keys to move around here and there.

string.name: s2
string.value: How's the traveling?

string.name: b0
string.value: Whoa...you look awkward there.

string.name: c0
string.value: Arrghh, my beautiful skin...

string.name: d0
string.value: Ready to try the maple Quiz?

string.name: d1
string.value: Right~! You are the one who solved all the quiz. Anyway, How are you?

string.name: n0
string.value: Do you need my help by any chance? I can handle machinery really well...

string.name: n1
string.value: I just ate a little bit ago...and yet I'm hungry already...!!

string.name: n2
string.value: Phew...work is hard. I need to take a break.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hmmm... I guess these things must be very useful in some places...

string.name: d1
string.value: Ah~~~ You are the one who collected stuff for me. You will get to have a job, soon. Oh, you didn't know that? If you get to the lv. 8, you can be a magician. Also, you should be at least lv. 10 to become a bowman, warrior and thief. You cannot do those in this Island, so take a ship from the South Perry and go to the Victoria Island.
